replies.msg:
Application folder 冇再已經 uninstall 咗
其他雜項 file 通常放 /Library

/Cache folder 佢自己會 clean up
/Preferences file 幾kb好細 照 keep 冇咩所謂

如果大app 有用 shared library
會放咗去 /Application Support
但大app 九成九有 uninstaller / uninstall script

replies.msg: 用 linux

老實講mac要裝好多輔助app先好用 但唔少app都係收費
如果部mac係公司機 冇理由自己比錢買app

mac個dock唔好用 次次都要show all window(我知有short cut) 跟住慢慢搵邊個window想要
Windows個taskbar有window preview 一指就搵到邊個window想要 而且跟open次序

mac mouse speed同mouse wheel scrolling個acceleration好怪又冇得disable 用到火滾

mac個trackpad係好好用呀 但我插external monitor個陣會用返自己keyboard mouse
